notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved to a different location.
notFound.helpText: If you think this is an error, please contact our support team.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.

forbidden.title: Access Forbidden
forbidden.description: Access to this resource is forbidden.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

generic.contactSupport: Please contact support if the problem persists
